mapper.insert: insert into pages (id, `by`, `name`, title, category, address, website, phone, image, cover, verified, `time`, description) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{by,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{category,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verified,jdbcType=BIT}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update pages set `by` = #{by,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category = #{category,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, website = #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cover = #{cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, verified = #{verified,jdbcType=BIT}, `time` = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, `by`, `name`, title, category, address, website, phone, image, cover, verified, `time`, description from pages where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, `by`, `name`, title, category, address, website, phone, image, cover, verified, `time`, description from pages
